channel.title: SSL on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari
channel.description: Recent content in SSL on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari

item.title: Part 5: Securing a Homelab with Cloudflare Tunnels and Zero Trust
item.description: Learn how to build a secure, globally-accessible homelab using a Cloudflare Tunnel. This guide covers implementing a Zero Trust security model to protect your services and eliminate the need for open router ports.

item.title: How I Built My Own Ad-Blocking DNS Server in the Cloud (Updated AWS Edition!)
item.description: Enjoy a faster, ad-free internet everywhere. This 2025 guide details how to build a free, private DNS server with AdGuard Home on an AWS EC2 instance, complete with SSL encryption and automated renewal.
